name: The Survivor (itch) (Ice Master)
description:
Story

You are in a city where only a few lucky ones were sent to live. All the time robots are doing everything for you, but all of a sudden the volcano errupted, lava surrounded the island and the robots got mad...

-----

Controls

Use WASD / Arrow Keys to move. Left mouse button for shooting, and Q to drop the gun you're holding.

-----

Credits

This game was made by these people from the Discord Server:

Programming - Ice Master and Leopc1977

Art and story - Cat

Other: Background Music - www.youtube.com/watch?v=dgCnYsDTiXU Player Character - https://opengameart.org/content/animated-top-down-survivor-player
